title: Blackberry Muffins with Cardamom Crunch Topping

ingredients.content: 1 lemon, thin peelings of skin only

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 190°C and line a 12 hole muffin tin with paper muffin cases.
Place flour, sugar, butter and cardamom in mixing bowl then mix <b>Turbo/1 sec/3 times<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place 40 g sugar and lemon peel in mixing bowl then grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add remaining 80 g sugar, butter and yoghurt then mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add flour, eggs and baking powder then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Fold in blackberries with spatula then divide evenly between prepared muffin cases. Scatter reserved topping over muffins then bake for 15-20 minutes (190°C) until firm and browned. Transfer to a wire rack and allow to cool.
Serve at room temperature or store in an airtight container until needed.
